fields.name: timestamp
fields.doc: Time of the measurement, floored to 15 sec

fields.name: xname
fields.doc: Unique identifier for the chassis of the measurement, e.g. x2007c7

fields.name: rectifier0_input_power
fields.doc: Input power for Rectifier0 (unit: W, interval: 15 sec)

fields.name: rectifier0_output_power
fields.doc: Output power for Rectifier0 (unit: W, interval: 15 sec)

fields.name: rectifier1_input_power
fields.doc: Input power for Rectifier1 (unit: W, interval: 15 sec)

fields.name: rectifier1_output_power
fields.doc: Output power for Rectifier1 (unit: W, interval: 15 sec)

fields.name: rectifier2_input_power
fields.doc: Input power for Rectifier2 (unit: W, interval: 15 sec)

fields.name: rectifier2_output_power
fields.doc: Output power for Rectifier2 (unit: W, interval: 15 sec)

fields.name: rectifier3_input_power
fields.doc: Input power for Rectifier3 (unit: W, interval: 15 sec)

fields.name: rectifier3_output_power
fields.doc: Output power for Rectifier3 (unit: W, interval: 15 sec)
